textBeforeTable: Hex Mesh Netting comes in 77 rolls of 0.9m, 60 rolls of 1.2m and 40 rolls of 1.8m per pallet. Hex Mesh Netting Product Range Locusrite Hex Mesh Netting is made from Hot Dip Galvanised material and is hot dipped prior to weaving. Specification Hex mesh Netting is used for floor screed reinforcement and roof insulation.
